message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  This way we can both get something without too much risk.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. We both get a good amount, and it leaves room for negotiation in the future rounds.

I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a better deal than this. Let's split 70/30 in my favor. This is the last offer I'll make with such a significant share.  After this, I'll be more cautious about losing more value with each passing round.
I'm willing to move closer to your proposal, but 60/40 is the most I can offer. This way we both get a fair share, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement in the next few rounds.
I'm  willing to go down to 60/40, but this is my final offer.  We're losing a lot of value with each round.  Let's avoid further losses and come to an agreement.
